version_description:
•Enhanced offline play.
•Enhanced Facebook integration.
•Bug fixes!

•Enhanced offline play.
•Enhanced Facebook integration.
•Bug fixes!
We’ve added Keychain login for users on iOS 11, squashed some bugs, and improved the download process for offline content!
We’ve added Keychain login for users on iOS 11, squashed some bugs, and improved the download process for offline content!

- Various bug fixes and speed improvements
- Crash fixes

- Various bug fixes and speed improvements
- Crash fixes

- Sort offline music by newest / oldest or alphabetically.
- After you hang up your phone call the app will resume playback.
- Crash fixes and speed improvements

- Sort offline music by newest / oldest or alphabetically.
- After you hang up your phone call the app will resume playback.
- Crash fixes and speed improvements
- Bug and crash fixes
- Bug and crash fixes

- New logo!
- Fixed crashes
- Bug fixes

- New logo!
- Fixed crashes
- Bug fixes

- New genres: Instrumentals, R&B, and Latin
- Crash fixes!
- Audiosnaps are now easier to make and look better! Give it a try.
- Indicator shows which song in a playlist or album is currently playing
- Speed improvements and bug fixes
- You can now retry downloads that fail by hitting the double-dot menu next to the song
- New Now playing design. Let us know what you think.

- New genres: Instrumentals, R&B, and Latin

- New Now playing design. Let us know what you think.
- Fixed a crash related to offline album artwork.
- Fixed a crash related to offline album artwork.

- In-app notifications are faster, better, stronger!

- Fixed an issue where artwork wouldn't display in offline music

- Restore Downloads! Now if you delete your offline music or get a new phone you can easily restore previously downloaded music. Simply go to your offline and select "Not on Device" from the dropdown menu. Click the menu button next to the track and select "Download" to take it offline again.
- Faster, Stronger! The audiomack app has been rebuilt for speed.
- Less Crashes! We have fixed a number of crashes affecting some users.
- Improvements to notifications.

- Restore Downloads! Now if you delete your offline music or get a new phone you can easily restore previously downloaded music. Simply go to your offline and select "Not on Device" from the dropdown menu. Click the menu button next to the track and select "Download" to take it offline again.
- Faster, Stronger! The audiomack app has been rebuilt for speed.
- Less Crashes! We have fixed a number of crashes affecting some users.
- Improvements to notifications.

- Fixed issue where some offline music would not play offline.

- Fixed issue where playback was slow for users with many downloads.
- Fixed issue where you could not delete songs from an album when playing that album.
- Fixed issue where users would see connection issues due to incorrect password
- Album tracks now added to the play queue in trending.

- Fixed issue where playback was slow for users with many downloads.
- Fixed issue where you could not delete songs from an album when playing that album.
- Fixed issue where users would see connection issues due to incorrect password
- Album tracks now added to the play queue in trending.

In this new version, you can:

- Download playlists for offline (premium)
- Download a song or album in one tap
- Cast music to Airplay or Chromecast (premium)
- Queue songs
- Filter re-ups out of your feed
- Refresh playlists
- And more!

Plus, we made lots of visual improvements, improved performance, and squashed bugs

If you hit any issues, please reach out to support@audiomack.com

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Audiomack is spruced up and running better than ever. In this build, we:
- Fixed an issue where some users were unable to skip tracks after rewinding or fast-forwarding.
- Added a re-ups filter for all users
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements

Audiomack is spruced up and running better than ever. In this build, we:
- Fixed an issue where some users were unable to skip tracks after rewinding or fast-forwarding.
- Added a re-ups filter for all users
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Was Audiomack occasionally freezing or hanging for you? Get our new update to resolve this issue. If you continue to experience this or other issues, please reach out to us at support@audiomack.com.
Was Audiomack occasionally freezing or hanging for you? Get our new update to resolve this issue. If you continue to experience this or other issues, please reach out to us at support@audiomack.com.

Audiomack is back and better than ever. New features include:
- Get notified each time a playlist you follow is updated
- Copy and share your profile link
- Share and view your YouTube page
- Filter re-ups out of your feed
- View total plays on profile pages
- Reduced the file size of the app
- Design adjustments and beautification
- Plus bug fixes and performance improvements

Audiomack is back and better than ever. New features include:
- Get notified each time a playlist you follow is updated
- Copy and share your profile link
- Share and view your YouTube page
- Filter re-ups out of your feed
- View total plays on profile pages
- Reduced the file size of the app
- Design adjustments and beautification
- Plus bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes, performance improvements, and design changes.

Get ready for one of our biggest releases ever:

- A fully redesigned player with comments, song information, and more music
- Chromecast
- An equalizer
- A new "edit account" screen
- An iMessage app
... and more than we have room to list here.

Enjoy! If you have questions, please reach out at support@audiomack.com.

We need to talk about something big: Audiomack has comments now! Tap any song, album, or playlist and join the conversation. Be nice.

Plus, critical bug fixes:

- Were you having trouble logging in with Twitter, Facebook, or Google? That should be fixed now.
- Were you having trouble downloading? That should be fixed now.
- Were you having trouble with music stopping? That should be fixed now.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Having trouble downloading music? We totally revamped downloading to make it smoother, faster, and more reliable.

We need to talk about something big: Audiomack has comments now! Tap any song, album, or playlist and join the conversation. Be nice.

Plus, critical bug fixes:

- Were you having trouble logging in with Twitter, Facebook, or Google? That should be fixed now.
- Were you having trouble downloading? That should be fixed now.
- Were you having trouble with music stopping? That should be fixed now.

Were you having trouble signing in with Google, Twitter, or Facebook? We totally retooled our authentication process to make it easy to get into your account in a tap. We also fixed bugs and improved performance.
This update is full of big changes you should never see. We worked hard to make the app faster, lighter, and more stable than ever. Update and try for yourself!

This new Audiomack drop is positively massive. Plus, we can now say, vous pouvez maintenant utiliser Audiomack en français!

That's right – the app is now available in French. Just switch your phone's language to French in settings and enjoy.

Plus:
- Sign up, sign in, and link your account to Twitter, Facebook, and Google.
- Lots of new visual and performance improvements
- Bug fixes (duh)
- And much more

Enjoy!
Plenty of exciting under-the-hood improvements in this update, plus bug fixes and performance improvements.
Under-the-hood adjustments and lots of bug fixes.

Looking for something? We've just totally overhauled search to make it easier than ever to find your favorite music, playlists, and artists. Hop on now and search "Verified Hip Hop", "Hometown Heroes: Hong Kong", Nicki Minaj, and start listening!
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Get ready for a big one: Audiomack is now fully available in Spanish! Go to your phone's settings and set Spanish as your default to translate the app.
As if that isn't big enough news: Highlight any song, album, or playlist on your profile to show off latest releases, favorite music, or anything you want the world to know you love.
On top of that, we made bug fixes, performance improvements, design improvements, and, as always, put our *heart* into this update.

This latest Audiomack release is fire. You could say it’s smoking. We’ve planted new features, weeded out bugs, and some secret new projects are growing under the surface. This update includes:
- A fully-updated support process
- Mention artists when you Tweet their music
- Beautification and design improvements
- Lots of improvements to downloading
- We sped up the smoke loader (seriously)
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Lots of big behind-the-scenes improvements to help you get more music in more places.

Plus: bug fixes and performance improvements!

Lots of big behind-the-scenes improvements to help you get more music in more places.

Plus: bug fixes and performance improvements!

Audiomack just got a lot more social: Share any song to Instagram, Snap, and Facebook Stories, or take a screenshot and share anywhere you like!

More good news: With this update, Audiomack will be the first to tell you about new releases the second they drop on our platform.

Plus bug fixes, performance improvements, design updates, and more.

Audiomack just got a lot more social: Share any song to Instagram, Snap, and Facebook Stories, or take a screenshot and share anywhere you like!

More good news: With this update, Audiomack will be the first to tell you about new releases the second they drop on our platform.

Plus bug fixes, performance improvements, design updates, and more.

Audiomack 5.3.0 is here!

Want to share feedback? Contact us at @audiomack on Twitter.

Artists: We want to celebrate your wins! When you release music, we will be the first to tell you when fans are listening, engaging, and playlisting your work.

We are very proud to introduce Trophies!

Go to the share menu of any song, album, or playlist, and tap "Trophies" to see all of its achievements. Tap any trophy to get a beautiful share image, then screenshot to tell the world.

Plus – Audiomack will soon begin sending you notifications as soon as you win any trophy so you can be the first to tell the world.

This release has lots more cool stuff – share to WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger, many new language localizations, bug fixes, performance improvements, design tweaks, and more.

Have questions or feedback? Please contact us on Twitter at @audiomack.

Don't know what to listen to? Audiomack now has lots of great new ways to get you to the music you might like:

Check out our search page for recommendations about what great songs to play. Plus: stay tuned for our new daily playlist notifications so you can know what new songs have been added to playlists you follow.

We also fixed bugs, updated the design, and improved performance.

Have questions? Please reach out on Twitter at @audiomack.

Welcome to version 5.8!

This version is full of improvements to downloads, including:
- The ability to restore backed-up versions of the app after reinstallation
- A new download experience for new music on the app
- A fully redesigned My Library page
- And more!

Plus tons of bug fixes and performance improvements

Please reach out to us on Twitter at @audiomack with any feedback.

Say hello to Audiomack version 5.9!

With this new version we made tons of behind-the-scenes improvements and design fixes. The app should run smoother than ever.

Plus... we added a sleep timer feature for premium users! Go to settings to check it out.

If you have any feedback or questions, please reach out to us on Twitter at @audiomack.

Audiomack 5.10 is here, and that's good news.

How good? Navigate to the Discover tab to check out Audiomack World live in the app. Read about breaking artists, new trends, the latest in music, and more.

This app also has tons of improvements and bug fixes, which should make it easier for you to listen uninterrupted.

Have questions or feedback? Reach out to us on Twitter at @audiomack.

Now it's easier than ever before to find the most exciting artists, curators, publications, labels, and more on Audiomack. Head over to the feed tab to find a totally-redesigned account recommendation experience.

This release also includes lots of bug fixes, design tweaks, performance improvements, and more.

Have questions? Please contact us at @audiomack on Twitter.

Welcome to Audiomack v6.0!

Profile pages are now fully dynamic. The app will make sure to show off the best content you have, not empty sections. Look out for more redesigns soon!

Also check out our new Discover page, which splits albums from songs for easier browsing.

Artists now display their most popular uploads on their profiles, making discovery easier.

This version also fixes bugs and improves performance and drops support for iOS 11.

- World articles are now on profile pages

Audiomack 6.2.0 makes discovering music easier than ever before!

- Get unlimited music recommendations whenever a queue ends (manage this feature in settings)
- Learn what music is trending in your location with geo-targeted charts
- Separately discover albums and songs on new profile pages
- PLUS: Join our beta by navigating to settings to be among the first to experience new versions of the app.

Questions? Reach out at @audiomack on Twitter!

Welcome to Audiomack v6.3!

This release has an all-new look for the homepage, featuring all the content you can enjoy on the platform in one place. This features our brand-new desi music section in Trending and Recently Added!

Also in this release is a brand-new feature for Premium users: Lyrics! Find them in the player and read along.

Questions? Reach out to @audiomack on Twitter.
